oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ellen Bayne
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foster, Stephen Collins, 1826-1864 [composer]
Sarony & Co. [lithographer]; Lawson [engraver]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Songs with piano; Vocal duets with piano; Popular music--United States--To 1901
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Title and floral designs with five insets : girl with hat in landscape garden with fountain, dog laying in front of dog house on farm, farm house in woods, girl with hat in garden, old couple at fireplace with cat.
"No. 24". Publisher's no. 2664. Advertisements on cover for "No. 12 : Old dog tray", "No. 20 : My old Kentucky home", "No. 23 : Little Ella" and "No. 22 : Old memories".
